text:
Jof Davies engineered MTDCNC’s podcast and Tech Corner production workflows.

Podcast responsibilities:
- Multicamera capture via ATEM.
- Live-to-tape switching or continuous recording.
- Audio capture, cleaning, and monitoring.
- Structuring metadata and edit markers.

Tech Corners:
- Camera operation, vision mixing, audio handling, and editing.
- Separate capture of close-up sequences.
- Rapid post-production workflows for polished output.

Jof produces approximately 12–20 Tech Corners per year currently, with significantly higher volume in earlier years.
